vote.text: Amendment SA 1445 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Cloture motion on amendment SA 1445 withdrawn by unanimous consent in Senate.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1445 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 1445 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Hirono. (consideration: CR S2002-2003; text: S2039-2041) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1445 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1445 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Hirono.
